title: Hour 2: Flash Point
description:
Marcus Spears and JJ Redick discuss which situation is the best for Kyrie Irving to succeed. Plus they debate whether Kevin Durant needs to add another ring for his legacy. The crew also reacts to comments Draymond Green made about the new wave of athlete media. Later Robert Griffin III joins the show to discuss whether the Cowboys will be better or worse this season. Finally breaking news, the crew reacts to Deshaun Watson settling 20 of his 24 civil lawsuits.
